subject: Collection of user fee through private contractor
text: HTTy 7Ff4 TGTHT wifelruT T_ Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ma Yact, Hro Wa6t 3 ToTAT TAT4) G44 / Fax 91.11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India "TA  /Extn.; 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Q 6, #qzr-10, #1A, 7 feaaf-110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 NHAV/13013/3/02-03/CMD-CO/Policy on Toll (Vol. IX) April 13, 2006 CHCULARNOi NHAICOMMERCIAL QPERATIONSIQZ3 Sub: Collection of user fee through Private Contractor . This is in continuation to our letter no. NHAI/13013/3/02-03/CMD-CO/Policy on Toll (Vol. IX) dated 7.3.2006 (copy enclosed) regarding opening of   single bid received while undertaking bidding process for engagement of Private Contractor: It has been decided that in the following two circumstances, the Project Directors shall invariably refer the case to Head Office and will not open the bids: 1 . If initially only one bid is received 2. If more than one bid are received and after opening of technical bids, only one bid is found to be technically qualified  This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
